sampleCount Mixer::Process ( sampleCount  maxSamples  ) 

Process a maximum of 'maxSamples' samples and put them into a buffer which can be retrieved by calling GetBuffer(). Returns number of output samples, or 0, if there are no more samples that must be processed.

References Clear(), CopySamples(), floatSample, Track::GetChannel(), WaveTrack::GetRate(), Track::LeftChannel, mBuffer, mFormat, mInputTrack, mInterleaved, MixSameRate(), MixVariableRates(), MixerSpec::mMap, mMaxOut, mMixerSpec, mNumBuffers, mNumChannels, mNumInputTracks, Track::MonoChannel, mQueueLen, mQueueStart, mRate, mSamplePos, mSampleQueue, mSRC, mT, mT1, mTemp, mTimeTrack, and Track::RightChannel.

Referenced by ExportPCM::Export(), ExportOGG::Export(), ExportMP3::Export(), ExportMP2::Export(), ExportFLAC::Export(), ExportFFmpeg::Export(), ExportCL::Export(), AudioIO::FillBuffers(), and MixAndRender().
